description:
‘Do you think you can handle a Goddess?’ Just the sound of Her voice would make any man wonder, but under Her expert hands we are shown the way.
Mistress Jasmine takes the lead as She teases and taunts this slave boy toward enlightenment administering pleasure, pain and humiliation in just the right doses.
From a ball slapping ‘Oink like a pig you piece of shit’, to a lust filled, ‘Fuck my pussy like a real man’, Mistress Jasmine takes us on an erotic ride through corporal punishment, strap on ass fucking, and a hot sex scene that leaves everyone satisfied.
title: Joshua and Jasmine Byrne
